pros: I taught communications, public relations, and social media to third- and fourth- year students. My students were extraordinary. They were open and enthusiastic about learning. EFAP's director plays a critical role in the success of the school. The support of colleagues also plays an essential role in adding to the positive experience of working at EFAP Paris.
cons: I had to create my own curriculum consisting of objectives and a list of courses, texts, and other resources. This was a unique situation. I could have used more assistance from the administration.
